footer: This ring was for our 55th wedding anniversary and I was late in ordering it. The BE staff did everything they could to get the ring to me as fast as possible and kept me in the loop on their progress. The gifts were a nice touch too. — Hal
I purchased for my wife as a holiday gift- she loves it because it is appropriate for any occasion. The diamond was larger that expected and she loves the sparkle. — Chris
I bought these earrings as a birthday gift for my wife. She loved them. They are ethically sourced, quality pearls that you can dress up or down. — Ben
